ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Breaking from conventional tactics
ygData.msgSnippet: Recently I have been revisting the All-Instrument attack in a group setting. And the situatuion you put foward here (multi-pull, one tank per mob) may fit in
ygData.messageBody:
Recently I have been revisting the All-Instrument attack in a group setting.
And the situatuion you put foward here (multi-pull, one tank per mob) may
fit in well with this.

At 47th I have been using
Chords of Dissonance: 30 + 1 (Gypsy Lute)
Denon's Disruptive Discord: 32 + 4 (McVaxius' Horn of War) + -AC to mobs
Niv's Melody of Preservation: regen 16 HP + 22 str + 20hp magic skin vs
spell damage

Effect: 67 dam/target + 16hp heal to all tanks/round

Vs LDCs and lava beetles in Sol B I get few if any resists.

At 48th it gets even better with Selo's Chords of Cessation:
Chords of Dissonance: 32 + 1 (Gypsy Lute)
Denon's Disruptive Discord: 33 + 4 (McVaxius' Horn of War) + -AC to mobs
Selo's Chords of Cessation: 50 + 2 (Gypsy Lute) + -atk speed to mobs

Effect: 122 dam/target/round

Makes me itchy to make 48 :)

Rokenn
Current logged in Maestro room in PoH, ouch!
